name: Communication Alert
description:
Stranded on a strange planet with nothing but a translation guide...

Will you find a way to go back home?

The prototype of a speech based narrative / puzzle game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BASIC MOVEMENT

INTRO:

Say "GO UP" to move the ship up.

Say "GO DOWN" to move the ship down.

MAIN GAME:

Say "TURN AROUND" to switch camera perspective to either the front or the back of the ship.

You can also say "LOOK BEHIND" to look behind you or  "LOOK INFRONT"  to look in front of you.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by:

Mike Veldkamp - Game Designer

Ruben den Ouden - Game Developer

Mercedes Aartsen - Character Artist

Rebecca Rupert - Environment Artist
